dontdropit.tooltip.drop.unblock_hint: Hold %s to allow dropping this item
dontdropit.config.title: Don't Drop It! Configuration
dontdropit.config.general.oob_click_drop: Blocks certain items from being dropped when clicking
outside of a screen with them selected.
dontdropit.config.drop_delay.enabled.too: Delays the drop action until the drop key is held for a certain
dontdropit.config.drop_delay.ticks.toolt: How many ticks the drop key needs to be held until the item is dropped.
dontdropit.config.drop_delay.do_delay_on: If enabled, the drop delay is only done once per stack.
After the first drop, all drops are instant until another stack is selected.
dontdropit.config.favorites.enabled.tool: Allows blocking items from being dropped completely.
dontdropit.config.favorites.draw_overlay: Toggles drawing a sprite overlay on favorite stacks.
By default, this is a lock icon.
dontdropit.config.favorites.enchantments: If enabled, items which have favorite enchantments that
cannot be applied to said items will not be seen as favored.
dontdropit.config.favorites.tags.tooltip: Items that are contained in any of these tags
dontdropit.config.favorites.tooltip: will be blocked from being dropped.
